about_the_game:
b]"Can you stay single for a long time?" [/b]

You are single and well decide to remain so, however, the rest of your entourage does not seem to agree and seeks at all costs to cover you with love.
It’s up to you to hold out as long as possible against the horde of pretenders with the help of your various abilities and powers, in frantic assaults
20 min

  • Choose who will woo you: Female, Male or ALL
  • Full mouse gameplay with automatic weapons
  • Various special abilities, dynamically activated with a simple left click
  • Romanticize your favorite harem categories (Onee-sama, Teacher, Orc and many others)
  • As the levels progress, the less your suitors seem to wear clothes...
  • Control twenty of the greatest archetypes of the world of romantic comedy (The pervert, the intellectual, the cook, the ... Kraken?, and many others)
  • Improve all abilities, permanently, thanks to the money recovered during your games
